item.title: Making a smoke alarm from a Xiaomi Air Purifier (part 1.)
item.description: When I purchased a Xiaomi Air Purifier (4 Lite) my first idea was to check if I can set alarms for certain AIQ values. After some research the short answer was no, however I didn’t want to give up so easily. So I went down the rabbit hole to find a solution for crearting an alarm and in the end I came up with a solution which got other featutes. This series of blog post will be about the journey.
